item.title: The ‘Mostly Peaceful’ Riots Are Back
item.description: Portland wasn’t alone, as local protesters clashed with local police over the weekend.

item.title: Virginia Proposal to Expand Offshore Wind Power Threatens National Security
item.description: Wind projects create radar interference and clutter that could put U.S. assets in Norfolk at risk.

item.title: Our Radical Moment’s Antecedents
item.description: So much of the tumult around us has its roots in the 1970s, the subject of Jason Burke’s new study.
